Description.Text: Located in Shangdi & Zhongguancun Science Park, Geosciences International Conference Centre is a perfect starting point from which to explore Beijing. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, 24-hour room service, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, are at hand. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Geosciences International Conference Centre.

Room No: 1

Smoking is only allowed in designated areas. Guests smoking elsewhere are responsible for all costs, damages, and liabilities caused by smoking.,Hotel is installing terrace for all rooms starting from today, estimate completion on Sep 30, 2019, from 8am-18pm. If period of stay more than 2days, customer might need change to other rooms with same standard or free upgrade on the 2nd day, depends on renovation schedule.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
